application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details Pursuant to Condition 7 (Visibility Splays) of planning permission ref. 21763/APP/2021/2568 (Appeal Ref. APP/R5510/W/21/3285551) dated 08/02/2022 for the 'Erection of a new residential building including duplex basement, first and roof accommodation for one replacement dwelling and 5 new dwellings with associated parking, cycle store and bin store including the demolition of the existing house.'
decision_conditions: The proposal, by reason of the front facing high boundary fence along Fairfield Road would result in poor visibility to and from the site to the detriment of the highway and pedestrian/occupiers conditions of the area. Therefore, the proposal would fail to comply with Policies D3, D4, T3, T4, T5, T6 and T7 of the London Plan (2021), Policy BE1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part One - Strategic Policies (2012) and Policies DMH 6, DMHB 11, DMHB 12, DMT 1, DMT 2, DMT 3, DMT 4, DMT 5 and DMT 6 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020).

The proposed street facing 1.8m high boundary fences along Fairfield Road and Harefield Road would result in a dominant, incongruous, visually intrusive and overbearing addition of which would cause significant harm to the host site, character and appearance of the area and visual amenities of the streetscene. Therefore, the proposal would be contrary to Policies D1, D3, D4 and H2 of the London Plan (2021), Policies BE1 and H1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part One - Strategic Policies (2012) and Policies DMH 6, DMHB 11, DMHB 12, DMHB 14, DMHB 18 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
